name: AstroPhysical
description:
Welcome to AstroPhysical!

A massive asteroid is hurtling towards Earth. The impact is, frankly, inevitable. But don't worry! Using the many tools in your arsenal, you can give the citizens of earth a few extra hours to live out their lives in peace :)

CHANGELOG:

04/04/2022 - Fixed game-breaking "end game" bug - permitted by LD rules. 

05/04/2022 - Added new targets
